content: all round 6 k2 sm k to marker sm k3 5 *k1 p1* 6x round 6 k8 10 *k1 p1* 6x k3 5 sm k to marker k8 10 sm k2 round 7 k2 sm m1r k to marker m1l sm k23 27 round 7 k23 27 sm m1r k to marker m1l sm k2 round 8 k2 sm k to marker sm k3 5 *k1 p1* 6x round 8 k8 10 *k1 p1* 6x k3 5 sm k to marker k8 10 sm k2 round 9 knit all round 9 knit all round 10 k2 sm m1r k to marker m1l sm k3 5 round 10 k8 10 *k1 p1* 6x k3 5 sm m1r k to *k1 p1* 6x k8 10 marker m1l sm k2 round 11 knit all round 11 knit all round 12 k2 sm k to marker sm k3 5 *k1 p1* 6x round 12 k8 10 *k1 p1* 6x k3 5 sm k to marker k8 10 sm k2 11 stitches between markers 11 stitches between markers 2 | p a ge © jacqueline henderson www youtube com/@jacqknits set aside thumb set aside thumb k2 place 11 stitches onto scrap yarn co 5 sts k23 27 place 11 stitches onto scrap yarn co 5 sts k23 27 k2 30 34 stitches 30 34 stitches hand hand round 1 k10 12 *k1 p1* 6x k8 10 round 1 k8 10 *k1 p1* 6x k10 12 round 2 knit all round 2 knit all repeat rnds 1 and 2 two three more times repeat rnds 1 and 2 two three more times round 3 *k1 p1* repeat to end of round round 3 *k1 p1* repeat to end of round round 4 knit all round 4 knit all repeat rnds 3 and 4 two more times repeat rnds 3 and 4 two more times bind off with stretchy bind off bind off with stretchy bind off thumb put 5 sts from cast on edge plus 3 stitches from scrap yarn onto one half of the long circular needle place the remaining 8 stitches from scrap yarn on to second half of the long circular needle with new working yarn knit all for a total of 8 rnds the first 5 stitches you will need to knit through the back loop to correct the orientation of the stitch on the needle bind off with stretchy bind off when weaving in ends take the tail from the start of the thumb and stitch to close up the two gaps at the base of the thumb weave in all other ends 3 | p a ge © jacqueline henderson www youtube com/@jacqknits
